title: New Smartphone App Locates on Demand Same Day Professionals
text:
The are smartphone apps like Uber that help you find a ride, Open Table to get us seats at our favorite restaurant, and Glam Squad to send a manicurist or beautician to our homes. Now a new app has launched to help consumers locate on demand same day service professionals such as air conditioning repairmen, plumbers and carpet cleaners who are already working in the consumers neighborhood that can provide them with real-time same day services.
The app and associated website is called samedaypros.com , and it is a GPS Based System that will give consumers the ability to find and secure professional On - Demand same day services in real time. No more waiting days to fix an air conditioner in August. No more dreaded four-hour arrival windows that keep you trapped in your home waiting for a technician to arrive. Just select your desired service into the app, and it will find an on demand service professional near you who can meet your needs in minutes.
The service is always free for consumer and they never pay for the service up front; they only pay when their services are completed to the consumers satisfaction.
Professional service providers can list their business for a ridiculously low monthly rate through the samedaypros.com one-of-a-kind dynamic pricing feature. Once a service provider signs up; they are locked into that rate for life. Since this new revolutionary app is a subscription model the service provider never pays a percentage of the sale to samedaypros.com .
"We created this app for the consumer to secure real time, reliable fulfillment of their same day service needs and to provide service providers with the most affordable platform to advertise their businesses and get more customers," said Corey L. Robinson, the CEO of samedaypros.com. In the coming months he aims to sign up thousands of service providers in more than 100 categories to ensure every customer's needs can be met, especially in an emergency â€” "who wants to wait days to get their hot water heater fixed, or to repair a faulty air conditioning unit?" he says. "Our app will eliminate the wait and get customers what they need, fast."
About Same Day Pros LLC
Same Day Pros LLC is a Miami, Florida start-up that connects consumers with On-Demand same day service professionals. It's Founder/CEO has been a professional service provider in the carpet cleaning business for more than 20 years before launching samedaypros,com.
